Name: Desktop Honey
About the game: Desktop Honey is a girl who can be placed on your desktop. You can interact with her, dance and pose. 18+DLC / Press F Game The mouse controls the translation, rotation and scaling of the character. Clothes change color and remove. Hair changes color. Shadow on or off. Background music on or off. Multiple dances and poses. Update Double click the left mouse button to open the UI, double click the left mouse button again to close the UI.
